title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat the eggs with cheese and black pepper.
Drain the pasta and combine with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices, then grill.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Blend the sauce, add cream, and mix with grilled chicken.
